mapper.insert: insert into a_report_downstream (downstreamReportId, appId, slotId, createTime, hour, downstreamRequest, t300, t400, t500, t1000) values (#{downstreamReportId},#{appId},#{slotId},now(),#{hour},#{downstreamRequest},#{t300},#{t400},#{t500},#{t1000})
mapper.update:
update a_report_downstream set downstreamRequest = downstreamRequest + 1
,t300 = t300 + 1
,t400 = t400 + 1
,t500 = t500 + 1
,t1000 = t1000 + 1
where downstreamReportId = #{downstreamReportId}
mapper.select: select s.appId,s.flowStatus,u.upstreamType,u.upstreamId,u.probability,u.upstreamPackageName,u.upstreamAppName,u.upstreamAppId,u.upstreamWidth,u.upstreamHeight from a_upstream u,a_adspace s where u.spaceId = #{spaceId} and u.probability > 0 and u.spaceId = s.spaceId
mapper.insert: insert into a_report_upstream (id, downstreamReportId, upstreamId, appId, slotId, upstreamType, createTime, hour, request, response, look, click, deeplink, t300, t400, t500, t1000) values (#{id},#{downstreamReportId},#{upstreamId},#{appId},#{slotId},#{upstreamType},now(),#{hour},1,#{response},0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
mapper.update:
update a_report_upstream set
request = request + 1
response = response + 1,t300 = t300 + #{t300},t400 = t400 + #{t400},t500 = t500 + #{t500},t1000 = t1000 + #{t1000}
look = look + 1
click = click + 1
deeplink = deeplink + 1
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select upstreamType,upstreamId,upstreamPackageName,upstreamAppId,probability from a_upstream where spaceId = #{spaceId} probability > 0
select upstreamId,upstreamType,content from a_ad_test where adType = #{adType} and status = 1 order by rand() limit 1
